channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Orbit Fox by ThemeIsle
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Orbit Fox by ThemeIsle

item.title: CVE-2021-24157|2024-08-03T19:21:18.299Z -- unknown -- orbit%20fox%20by%20themeisle
item.description: Orbit Fox by ThemeIsle has a feature to add custom scripts to the header and footer of a page or post. There were no checks to verify that a user had the unfiltered_html capability prior to saving the script tags, thus allowing lower-level users to inject scripts that could potentially be malicious.

item.title: CVE-2021-24158|2024-08-03T19:21:18.563Z -- unknown -- orbit%20fox%20by%20themeisle
item.description: Orbit Fox by ThemeIsle has a feature to add a registration form to both the Elementor and Beaver Builder page builders functionality. As part of the registration form, administrators can choose which role to set as the default for users upon registration. This field is hidden from view for lower-level users, however, they can still supply the user_role parameter to update the default role for registration.
